biotools.summary: GM-Pep is an integrated approach contained two parts, one is multi-class generator (CVAE model) which was responsibility for generating potential drug-like peptides, the other is multi-classifier (Deep-Multiclassifier) which predicted bioactivity probability of generated peptides by CVAE model.

bioschemas.name: GM-Pep
bioschemas.summary: GM-Pep is an integrated approach contained two parts, one is multi-class generator (CVAE model) which was responsibility for generating potential drug-like peptides, the other is multi-classifier (Deep-Multiclassifier) which predicted bioactivity probability of generated peptides by CVAE model.
